main event: A pilot reported a sighting of a ball of fire trailing light over Akpotok Island in Newfoundland.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on 20 May 1956., The object was described as orange and resembling a ball of fire., The estimated speed of the object was between 600 to 1800 knots per hour., The sighting lasted for approximately 4 to 5 seconds., Both the pilot and co-pilot confirmed that it was not a star.
witness description: pilot and co-pilot of a DC-4 aircraft
